collection:
We do collect some data about user visits to help
us better understand how the public uses the site and how to make it more
helpful.
* Use the URL parameter email, and tool for distributed software, so that we can track your project and contact you if there is a problem.
sharing:
In the event of authorized law
enforcement investigations and pursuant to any required legal process,
information from these sources may be used to help identify an individual.

Therefore, NCBI itself places no
restrictions on the use or distribution of the data contained therein.

NCBI is not in a position to assess the validity of such claims and since
there is no transfer of rights from submitters to NCBI, NCBI has no rights to
transfer to a third party.
